title: (x) Bauhaus-like typeface - various {gang}
content:
I need a font like the one I have drawn in the attachment. It is think, symetric, and has rounded angles. Notice the 'w' is round on the bottoms instead of having sharp angles. I also gave two examples of how the 'b' should look. Note; these are hand drawings, I am not looking for a font that emulates handwriting. Please help and thanks for your time.   
  ![Hand drawn example](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130836im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69012.jpg)
author: ohal3000

comments.content:
There are many of that kind, Ryan.   
   
 [P22 Bayer Universal](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130836/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/bayer-universal/)   
 [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130836/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/)   
 [Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130836/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/)   
 [Blippo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130836/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blippo-black/)   
 ... are just a few
